children.title: Name Change
children.definition: You want help changing your legal name.

children.title: Adoption
children.definition: You want help moving parental rights over a child to new parents.

children.title: Child Guardianship
children.definition: You want help appointing someone to manage the care, property, and finances of a child.

children.title: Separation Agreement
children.definition: You and your spouse are thinking about living apart for a time while you decide if you'll be getting a divorce.

children.title: Contested Divorce
children.definition: You and your spouse want to end your marriage.

children.title: Child Custody
children.definition: You want help establishing who has the right to care for and make important decisions about a child.

children.title: Postnuptial Agreement
children.definition: You and your spouse are looking for a document that clarifies each of your financial expectations.

children.title: Paternity
children.definition: You want help establishing who the legal parent of a child is.

children.title: Alimony/Spousal Support
children.definition: You want help determining what financial support one ex-spouse needs to provide the other.

children.title: Parental-Rights Termination
children.definition: You want help with a court process  brought to end the rights of one or more parents over their child.

children.title: Emancipation
children.definition: You want help with a court process brought to let a child assume responsibility for their own care, property, and finances.

children.title: Adult Guardianship
children.definition: You want help appointing someone to manage the care, property, and finances of an adult who can't take care of themselves anymore.

children.title: Domestic Violence/Civil Order of Protection
children.definition: You want protection from a person who is harrassing, threatening, abusing, or intimidating you.

children.title: Annulment
children.definition: You want help ending a marriage that was not legitimate in the first place because of fraud, deceit, misunderstanding, or another issue.

children.title: Uncontested Divorce
children.definition: You and your spouse want to end your marriage and already agree on how to deal with issues involving your property, finances, and children.

children.title: Child Support
children.definition: You have an issue involving the financial support that a parent may owe to a child.

children.title: Prenuptial Agreement
children.definition: You and your fiance are about to get married and are looking for a document that clarifies each of your financial expectations.

children.title: Harassment
children.definition: You want to stop someone from abusing, threatening, stalking, or annoying you.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Contract Formation
children.definition: You want help negotiating or drafting a business contract.

children.title: Business Dispute/Litigation
children.definition: You want help with a legal dispute involving your business.

children.title: Business Formation
children.definition: You are starting a business and want to structure your business to meet your goals.

children.title: Corporate Changes
children.definition: You want help making a change in the structure, management, or ownership of your business corporation.

children.title: Contract Dispute
children.definition: You want help with a legal dispute involving a business contract.

children.title: Online business law
children.definition: You have an issue involving your internet or software business.

children.title: Licenses, corporate changes, and filings
children.definition: You want help with a business organization or licensing matter, such as changing the legal structure or governance of your business or applying for a license to operate.

children.title: Government contracts
children.definition: You want help drafting, negotiating, or applying for a government contract.

children.title: Compliance
children.definition: You want help making sure your business is operating in accordance with federal, state, and/or local rules or laws.

children.title: Construction law
children.definition: You have an issue or dispute involving the construction of a home or building, such as negotiating a contract with a builder or complying with construction laws.

children.title: Business Compliance
children.definition: You want help understanding how your business's legal structure, government rules, contracts, or laws affect your business.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Identity Theft
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving someone stealing or misusing your personal information.

children.title: Credit Report Issue
children.definition: You want help correcting an inaccuracy or other issue with your credit report.

children.title: Consumer Fraud
children.definition: You have an issue involving unfair, deceptive, or misleading business practices.

children.title: Advertising and Unfair Banking Practices
children.definition: You want help bringing a claim against a bank that acted in deceptive, abusive, or misleading ways.

children.title: Predatory Lending
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving a loan that has abusive, deceptive, or unfair terms.

children.title: Consumer Finance Protection
children.definition: You want help with unfair or deceptive practices related to a mortgage, credit card, and other financial product or service.

children.title: Debt Collection
children.definition: You were contacted by a debt collector and want help responding.

children.title: Student loan
children.definition: You have an issue involving loans you took out to pay for education.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Living Will/Advanced Directive
children.definition: You are looking for documents that set out your wishes for end-of-life medical care.

children.title: Trust
children.definition: You want a document for managing and distributing your property on behalf of one or more beneficiaries.

children.title: Power of Attorney
children.definition: You want a document that appoints someone to manage your care, property, and finances if you become unable to.

children.title: Guardianship
children.definition: You want help appointing someone to manage the care, property, and finances of a person.

children.title: Will
children.definition: You want documents that set out your wishes for what happens to your property when you pass.

children.title: Probate
children.definition: You want help with the court process used to decide the inheritance, management, or division of the property of someone who passed away.

children.title: Simple Trust
children.definition: You want a document that distributes income from your estate to beneficiaries immediately, instead of accruing savings and distributing income to beneficiaries at a later date.

children.title: Estate Planning
children.definition: You want documents that set out your wishes for your medical care and what happens to your property when you pass.

children.title: Medicaid Special Needs Trust
children.definition: You want a docmument that holds funds for the benefit of a disabled person without impacting their eligibility for Medicaid.

children.title: Elder abuse/neglect
children.definition: You have an issue involving the mistreatment of an elderly adult.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Tenant Representation
children.definition: You are a tenant and want help with an issue involving your home.

children.title: Landlord Representation
children.definition: You are a landlord and want help with an issue involving your property.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Naturalization
children.definition: You want to apply for citizenship.

children.title: Asylum
children.definition: You don't want to return to your home country because you're afraid you'll be badly treated there.

children.title: Violence Against Women Act Petition
children.definition: You want to become a permanent resident, and you or your child have been the victim of abuse.

children.title: T Visa
children.definition: You want to remain and work in the United States, and you or your family member were forced or tricked into performing work or sexual acts.

children.title: Deportation Defense
children.definition: You want to defend against the government trying to remove you from the United States.

children.title: Employment-Based Visas
children.definition: You want to come to or stay in the United States for a limited, work-related purpose.

children.title: Family-Based Visas
children.definition: You want to become a permanent resident on the basis of your family relationship or employment status.

children.title: Special Immigrant Juveniles Status (SIJS)
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving an undocumented immigrant who arrived in the United States at a young age, was mistreated by a parent, and wants to apply for legal residency.

children.title: U Visas
children.definition: You want to remain and work in the United States, and you or your child have been the victim of a serious crime.

children.title: DACA
children.definition: You came to the United States as a child and want to stay in the country.

children.title: Criminal Charges Affecting Status
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue that may impact your ability to remain in the United States.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Traffic Ticket
children.definition: You want help with a traffic offense.

children.title: RICO & Conspiracy
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue involving an allegation of participation in a criminal organization.

children.title: DUI
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue or allegation involving driving a car or other kind of motor vehicle while under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

children.title: Ordinance Violations/Fines
children.definition: You have an issue involving an alleged violation of city laws or regulations.

children.title: Criminal Record Expungement
children.definition: You want to remove a charge or conviction from your criminal record.

children.title: Criminal Felonies
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue involving the chance of more than a year of imprisonment (for example: assault, aggravated battery, burglary, homicide).

children.title: Criminal Misdemeanors
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue involving the chance of less than a year of imprisonment (for example: disorderly conduct, public intoxication, theft, trespassing).

children.title: Post-Conviction Appeals & Relief
children.definition: You have been convicted of a crime and want help getting a new trial, reduced penalty, or shorter sentence.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

parent.title: Civil litigation - auto damage, contracts, collections

children.title: Personal Property Cases (Non-Small Claims)
children.definition: You want help with a legal dispute involving personal property that's value makes the dispute ineligible for small claims court.

children.title: Class action
children.definition: You want help bringing a lawsuit against a person, company, organization, or government agency that caused injuries, financial losses, or other kinds of harms that affected a large group of people.

children.title: General
children.definition: You want help with court litigation in a non-criminal matter.

children.title: Auto fraud/auto repossessions
children.definition: You want to be compensated because you purchased a car with hidden defects, or you want to keep your car from being wrongfully repossessed.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Contesting Non-Competes
children.definition: You need help contesting an agreement with a former employer that restricts you from working.

children.title: Workplace Harassment
children.definition: You want to stop someone at your workplace from abusing, threatening, or annoying you.

children.title: Wage Theft/Unpaid Benefits
children.definition: You have an issue involving benefits or compensation that you may be owed by an employer.

children.title: Wrongful Discrimination in Workplace
children.definition: You are being treated unfairly by an employer because of your race, gender, religion, national origin, physical or mental disability, age, sexual orientation, or gender identity.

children.title: Severance agreements
children.definition: You want help drafting or reviewing an agreement that terminates the working relationship between an employer and employee.

children.title: Workers compensation
children.definition: You have an issue involving benefits or compensation that you may be owed or may owe because of a job-related illness or injury.

children.title: Defense of the employee
children.definition: You are an employee and are seeking to defend yourself against a claim brought by your current or former employer.

children.title: Defense of the employer
children.definition: You are an employer and are seeking to defend yourself against a claim brought by a current or former employee.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Real Estate Disputes
children.definition: You want help with a legal dispute involving real estate.

children.title: Homeowners Association Dispute
children.definition: You are a homeowner and want help with a legal dispute with a homeowners association.

children.title: Title
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving your rights in a home, building, or other piece of property.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Lien
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving a government claim on your property because of allegedly unpaid taxes.

children.title: Criminal Tax Matter
children.definition: You want help with a criminal issue involving your taxes.

children.title: Tax Court Filing
children.definition: You want help with the special court process related to challenging or responding to tax issues.

children.title: Penalty Abatement
children.definition: You want to request penalties related to unpaid or unfiled taxes.

children.title: Tax Fraud & Tax Evasion
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving an allegation or claim of intentionally avoiding taxes.

children.title: Audit
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving a goverment reveiw of your tax return's accuracy and completeness.

children.title: Appeal
children.definition: You want to challenge a government decision about your taxes.

children.title: Collection matter
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving taxes the government claims you owe it.

children.title: Levy
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving the government taking your property to satisfy a debt or taxes you allegedly owe.

children.title: Wage Garnishment
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving the goverment deducting money from your wages because of allegedly unpaid taxes.

children.title: Payment Agreement
children.definition: You want help reaching an agreement with the goverment to pay a tax debt in monthly installments, instead of having to pay all at once.

children.title: Payroll Tax
children.definition: You want help with an issue involving taxes related to employment.

children.title: Employee Reclassification
children.definition: You want to reduce tax penalties you may owe by voluntarily reclassifying independent contractors who work for your business as employees.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Representation of Insured
children.definition: You want help challenging the practices of your insurance company.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Arbitration
children.definition: You want help with the binding process where a neutral third party resolves a dispute between you and another party.

children.title: Mediation
children.definition: You want help with the non-binding process where a neutral third party helps you and another party try to resolve a dispute and potentially avoid court litigation.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Government Record
children.definition: You want help getting the information or records from the government.

children.title: Constitutional Right
children.definition: You want help because the government, a private organization, or a person violated your constitutional rights (for example: free expression, privacy, reproductive rights).

children.title: Discrimination
children.definition: You are being treated unfairly by the goverment, a private organization, or person because of your race, gender, religion, national origin, physical or mental disability, age, sexual orientation, or gender identity.

children.title: Government misconduct
children.definition: You want help because you were harmed or mistreated by a government official or agency.

children.title: Police misconduct
children.definition: You want help because you were harmed or mistreated by a police officer.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Unlawful foreclosure
children.definition: You want help defending your property against a foreclosure threat that's based on bad information, disclosure failures, or fraud.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Nonprofit Formation
children.definition: You are starting a nonprofit and want to structure the organization to meet your goals.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Medical malpractice
children.definition: You want help because a doctor or other kind of health care provider made mistakes that caused an injury.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Government benefits
children.definition: You have an issue involving benefits or compensation that the government may owe you.

children.title: Unemployment benefits
children.definition: You have an issue involving money that may be owed by you or to you because of unemployed status.

children.title: SSI/Disability
children.definition: You have an issue involving benefits the government may owe you because of a physical or mental issue or disability.

children.title: Veteran benefits
children.definition: You have an issue involving benefits the government may owe you because of your military service.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: General bankruptcy
children.definition: You want help getting rid of debts you owe.

children.title: Fraud-related bankruptcy
children.definition: You have an issue involving an allegation that you misled or intentionaly hid information when you filed for bankruptcy.

children.title: Foreclosure-related bankruptcy
children.definition: You want help defending your property against a foreclosure and getting rid of your debts.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Copyrights, trademarks, or patents
children.definition: You have an issue involving the rights to an invention, creative work, or phrase or symbol.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.title: Special education
children.definition: You have an issue involving the education of a child with a learning disability or other special needs.

children.title: General
children.definition: You have an issue involving school rules or the laws related to education.

children.title: School discipline
children.definition: You have an issue involving a school punishing or penalizing a student for alleged misconduct.

children.title: Other
children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.

children.definition: You have an issue that wasn’t described above, or you don't know what issue to choose.
